mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Visual-first platform for creative professionals, artists, and content creators. Primarily used for professional portfolios but also supports online stores. Unlike general-purpose Wix, Pixpa specializes in helping visual creators display work and establish expertise through image-focused websites.
